actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: For the relief of Hilario R. Armijo, Timothy W. Armijo, Allen M. Baca, Vincent A. Chavez, David G. Chinana, Victor Chinana, Ivan T. Gachupin, Michael J. Gachupin, Frank Madalena, Jr., Dennis P. Magdalena, Anthony M. Pecos, Lawrence A. Seonia, Jose R. Toledo, Robert P. Toledo, Nathaniel G. Tosa, Allen L. Toya, Jr., Andrew V. Waquie, and Benjamin P. Waquie.

summary.text: Authorizes 18 named individuals, or the legal representatives of their estates, to commence an action on a claim against the United States for injuries or death sustained by such individuals in a truck accident which occurred as a result of alleged negligence of employees of the United States during firefighting operations in August 1986.

titles.title: For the relief of Hilario R. Armijo, Timothy W. Armijo, Allen M. Baca, Vincent A. Chavez, David G. Chinana, Victor Chinana, Ivan T. Gachupin, Michael J.
